[!go1.18] skip 'type parameters require Go 1.18 or later'

gofumpt foo.go
cmp stdout foo.go.golden

-- go.mod --
module test

go 1.18
-- foo.go --
package main

func Foo[   A, B any](x A, y B) {}

func main() {
	Foo[int,int](1,2)
}
-- foo.go.golden --
package main

func Foo[A, B any](x A, y B) {}

func main() {
	Foo[int, int](1, 2)
}
